pkgmetadata.longdescription: Query 'HaploReg' and 'RegulomeDB' // A set of utilities for querying 'HaploReg' http://archive.broadinstitute.org/mammals/haploreg/haploreg.php and 'RegulomeDB' http://www.regulomedb.org web-based tools. The package connects to 'HaploReg' or 'RegulomeDB', searches and downloads results, without opening web pages, directly from R environment. Results are stored in a data frame that can be directly used in various kinds of downstream analyses.
